title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Use the `random` module to:
1. Generate 5 random numbers between 1-100
2. Shuffle a list of names
3. Pick a random winner

**Starter code:**
instructions:
Use the `random` module to:
1. Generate 5 random numbers between 1-100
2. Shuffle a list of names
3. Pick a random winner

**Starter code:**

hints.text: Use random.randint(1, 100) for numbers, random.shuffle(list) to shuffle, random.choice(list) to pick one.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
